software_masters.planner_networking

Class ServerImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • software_masters.planner_networking.ServerImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, Server

    public class ServerImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Server
    Author:
    Lee Kendall, Wesley Murray This class is the server for our business planner application initialized with two accounts - an Admin(Username: admin, password: admin, cookie: 0) and a normal user (Username: user, password: user, cookie: 1) initialized with one department - (name: default) The default department has a default plan file - (year: "2019", candEdit: true, Plan Centre_Plan_1) planTemplateMap is initialized with VMOSA and Centre

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerImplementation()
      Initializes server with default objects listed above for testing

      • savePlan

        public void savePlan(PlanFile plan,
                     java.lang.String cookie)
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Saves planFile to the user's department if that planFile is marked as editable. If not editable, an exception is thrown. An exception is also thrown if a newly created planFile is not assigned a year.
        Specified by:
        savePlan in interface Server
